entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
